content.text:
# 1967–68 San Francisco Warriors season

The 1967–68 San Francisco Warriors season was the Warriors' 22nd season in the NBA and 6th in the San Francisco Bay Area. The Warriors entered the season hoping to improve upon their previous season output of 44–37. They failed to do so, finishing the season with a 43–39 record, but they still made the playoffs.
